title: B2 First (FCE) - Reading & Use of English
description: A complete mock exam for the B2 First Reading and Use of English paper.

sections.title: Multiple Choice Cloze
sections.instructions: For questions 1-8, read the text below and decide which answer (A, B, C or D) best fits each gap.

items.prompt: The historical building was ___ restored to its former glory.
items.explanation: 'Lovingly' is the most natural adverb used with 'restored' in this context.

items.prompt: She decided to ___ up a new hobby during the summer.
items.explanation: 'Take up' is the phrasal verb meaning to start a new activity.

sections.title: Open Cloze
sections.instructions: For questions 9-16, read the text below and think of the word which best fits each gap. Use only one word in each gap.

items.text: It was ___ a beautiful day that we decided to go for a picnic.
